rules.title: Front-facing side prohibition

Qualifiers.scope: Excavated lightwells and stairwells associated with a dwelling/basement on a lot
Qualifiers.applicability: All proposed lightwells and stairwells attached to or serving the main dwelling

Variables.name: feature_side_orientation
Variables.description: Which side of the structure the feature is located on relative to designated yards

Conditions.statement: Such features may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard.

Relationships.hierarchy: Location restriction within Light well & stairwell standards & site planning

Ambiguities: Front yard designation may be ambiguous on corner lots or lots with multiple frontages unless defined elsewhere.

Qualifiers.applicability: Interior opening width of each individual feature
Qualifiers.exclusions: Encasing/retaining structure thickness excluded from measurement per note

Variables.name: interior_opening_width
Variables.description: Clear interior width of the lightwell or stairwell opening

rules.title: Total length of all features limited by basement perimeter

Qualifiers.scope: All excavated lightwells and stairwells associated with the structure
Qualifiers.applicability: Sum of interior lengths of openings of all such features, excluding encasing structure
Qualifiers.exclusions: Encasing/retaining structure not counted in length

Variables.name: sum_all_features_length
Variables.description: Sum of interior opening lengths of all excavated features (encroaching and non-encroaching)

Conditions.statement: Combined length of all excavated features may not exceed 30% of basement perimeter.

cross_references: Figure 39 formula: a + b + c + d (all features) may not exceed 30% of the perimeter of the basement

rules.title: Maximum encroachment into required side yard

Qualifiers.scope: Portions of lightwells and stairwells extending into required side yards
Qualifiers.applicability: Any encroachment into required side yard(s)
Qualifiers.exclusions: Not applicable where there is no required side yard

Variables.name: side_yard_encroachment_depth
Variables.description: Perpendicular distance a feature extends into the required side yard from the required yard boundary or building envelope

Conditions.statement: Allowable encroachment into required side yard is 3' max.

cross_references: Figure 39 labeling: '3' max., into side yard (Typ.)'

rules.title: Minimum distance from side lot line

Qualifiers.scope: Lightwells and stairwells located near side lot lines
Qualifiers.applicability: Any feature regardless of encroachment status

Variables.name: distance_to_side_lot_line
Variables.description: Shortest horizontal distance from the feature edge (opening) to the side lot line

Conditions.statement: Feature must be a minimum of 3' from side lot line.

cross_references: Figure 39 labeling: '3' min. from lot line (Typ.)'

rules.title: Maximum encroachment into required rear yard

Qualifiers.scope: Portions of lightwells and stairwells extending into required rear yards
Qualifiers.applicability: Any encroachment into required rear yard
Qualifiers.exclusions: Not applicable where there is no required rear yard

Variables.name: rear_yard_encroachment_depth
Variables.description: Perpendicular distance a feature extends into the required rear yard from the required yard boundary or building envelope

Conditions.statement: Allowable encroachment into required rear yard is 4'.

rules.title: Total length of encroaching features limited

Qualifiers.scope: All portions of lightwells and stairwells that encroach into any required yard (side or rear) on all sides of the structure
Qualifiers.applicability: Sum of interior opening lengths of encroaching features only
Qualifiers.exclusions: Non-encroaching portions of features not counted toward the 15' limit

Variables.name: sum_encroaching_features_length
Variables.description: Total combined interior opening length of all encroaching features or encroaching portions of features

Conditions.statement: Combined length of all the excavated features or portions that encroach into required yards, on all sides, may not exceed 15'.

cross_references: Figure 39 formula: a + b (encroaching features) may not exceed 15'

rules.title: Protection of neighboring trees

Qualifiers.scope: Construction, placement, and operation of excavated lightwells and stairwells
Qualifiers.applicability: All proposed features in proximity to neighboring trees

Variables.name: neighboring_trees_presence
Variables.description: Presence of neighboring trees that could be affected by excavation or drainage

Variables.name: tree_impact_assessment
Variables.description: Assessment outcome indicating whether the feature would be harmful to neighboring trees

Conditions.statement: Excavated features shall not be harmful to neighboring trees.

Ambiguities: The term 'harmful' is not defined; criteria and assessment methodology are unspecified.

rules.title: Public Works approval for drainage

Qualifiers.scope: Drainage systems associated with excavated lightwells and stairwells
Qualifiers.applicability: Any drainage system handling runoff or groundwater for these features

Variables.name: drainage_system_present
Variables.description: Indicates whether a drainage system is proposed/installed for the feature(s)

Variables.name: drainage_approval_status
Variables.description: Approval status by the Public Works Department

Conditions.statement: Public Works Department must approve drainage system.

Ambiguities: Jurisdiction for the 'Public Works Department' and approval criteria are not specified.

Qualifiers.scope: All dimensional measurements of lightwell and stairwell openings stated in these standards
Qualifiers.applicability: Interior dimensions of openings; excludes encasing/retaining structure
Qualifiers.exclusions: Encasing structure dimensions are not included in measured values

Variables.name: measurement_basis
Variables.description: Basis used for measuring dimensional constraints

Conditions.statement: Measurements are based on interior dimension of opening and exclude encasing structure.
